entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
